td.content: s:white male factory worker aged 44 years presents with moderate feelings of apprehension when taking tests, moderate sudden onset of extreme anxiety, tremulousness and sweating immediately before public appearances and Mental Health x 7 days. he states he has never smoked a cigarette in his life Alcohol 1-4 beers/month o:Height 165 cm, Weight 91.1 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 15 a:Anxiety p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Buspirone - 15 mg /day, and ordered GAD - 7 Assessment Tool.

td.content: s:45 yo M factory worker presents with 2 months history of moderate feelings of apprehension when taking tests. pt reports moderate sudden onset of extreme anxiety, tremulousness and sweating immediately before public appearances. Patient does not smoke he drinks alcohol occasionally o:Height 166 cm, Weight 92.6 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 16 a:Anxiety p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Buspirone - 15 mg /day, and ordered GAD - 7 Assessment Tool.
